name: artemisia
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a family of bushes and plants which have a strong smell and some of which are used as medicines: Tarragon is the species of artemisia most widely used in cooking. A compound derived from the leaves of the artemisia, called artemisinin, is one of the most effective treatments against malaria. Artemisia are very drought tolerant. See also
tarragon
wormwood
